43.ara-name: كتاب الأدب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Wahb bin Hudaifah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "A man has more right to his seat. If he leaves for some need of his, then he returns, then he has more right to his seat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ إِذَا قَامَ الرَّجُلُ مِنْ مَجْلِسِهِ ثُمَّ رَجَعَ إِلَيْهِ فَهُوَ أَحَقُّ بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: When A Man Stands From His Seat Then Returns [To It] Then He Has More Right To it
